ygData.subject: Re: Roleplay
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Shameless plug http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/ Enjoy. Talies the Wanderer Check out the EverQuesting Bard: http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:00 AM 12/3/99 +0900, you wrote:
>From: "Daniel Fung"<dfung@...>
>
>
>I think this is the list that has the most numbers of active participants.
>I'm impress by the amount of information/idea/opinion flowing through
>everyday. I guess this is the nature of Bards, right? sharing of tales,
>get to know people all around and spreading the Lore of the Land of Norrah.
>
>I like to be one of those bards but I still lack the creativity and the
>experience to roleplay it well. Can anybody point me to websites or share
>your experience on how to roleplay it right? I wanna be a real Bard.


Shameless plug

http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/

Enjoy.



Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
